page.title: 05Farming at Upper Bentley
page.content: The Farm office is staffed by a full-time secretary dealing with {administration}such as invoices for new machinery, fertilizers, crop-spray dips animal medicines,fuels (2 kinds of diesel) and sending out bills for livestock and grain as well as dealing with tax-returns, V.A.T., and the vast amount of form-filling required by the {Ministry of Agriculture}and Fisheries. {Recreation}is a luxury and usually connected with{farming}interests like the N.F.U. or the Young Farmers for Philip and Martin Gibbs. They also enjoy an annual visit to the Royal Show where they exhibit their pedigree animals. Mr Gibbs goes abroad twice a year for a change but all the family are devoted to their chosen way of live.
